title: Come up with 2 names for our products (Health and Safety Industry)
snippet:
Our system is installed in nursing homes in the USA.

Our system tracks and locates resident (patients), staff (doctors, nurses, administrators, housekeepers etc) and assets (wheelchairs, beds etc) in the facility.

Residents wear a tracker which looks like a watch.  This watch tracks their location and can also collect medical informations such as temperature, heart rate, motion etc.

Staff wear a badge the size of a credit card (but thicker) with buttons.  This tag is used to open doors.  It also tracks the location of the staff members.

Both trackers (resident and staff) have a help button on them which activates an alarm when pressed.

We are looking to rename both of these devices.

we are looking for a catchy, intuative name for both of these devices.

please provide 5 names for the watch worn by patients and 5 names for the badge worn by the medical staff.  

We will be receiveing a number of suggestions from different candidates.   The winning names will receive an extra $50 dollars in bonus (extra $25 for each product).

so in essence.
if you provide 6 names (3 for each product) you will get $50.
if we select one of your names, you will get $75.
if we select both names, you will get $100.
